spec.description: Sort a sequence into ascending order.

payload.yaml:
constraints:
  - result must be ascending
description: Sort a sequence into ascending order.
examples:
  -
    input:
      arr:
        - 3
        - 1
        - 2
    output:
      result:
        - 1
        - 2
        - 3
id: array_sort
inputs:
  -
    description: Input array
    name: arr
    type: vector<int>
latency_target_ms: 100
metadata:
  difficulty: easy
  locale: en
  tags:
    - arrays
    - sorting
natural_prompt: Sort the array ascending.
outputs:
  description: Sorted array
  type: vector<int>
proof_required: false
